owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

ghsa_id.description: The GHSA (GitHub Security Advisory) identifier of the advisory.

summary.description: A short summary of the advisory.

description.description: A detailed description of what the advisory impacts.

cve_id.description: The Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE) ID.

vulnerabilities.description: A product affected by the vulnerability detailed in a repository security advisory.

package.description: The name of the package affected by the vulnerability.

ecosystem.description: The package's language or package management ecosystem.

name.description: The unique package name within its ecosystem.

vulnerable_version_range.description: The range of the package versions affected by the vulnerability.

patched_versions.description: The package version(s) that resolve the vulnerability.

vulnerable_functions.description: The functions in the package that are affected.

cwe_ids.description: A list of Common Weakness Enumeration (CWE) IDs.

credits.description: A list of users receiving credit for their participation in the security advisory.

login.description: The username of the user credited.

type.description: The type of credit the user is receiving.

severity.description: The severity of the advisory. You must choose between setting this field or `cvss_vector_string`.

cvss_vector_string.description: The CVSS vector that calculates the severity of the advisory. You must choose between setting this field or `severity`.

collaborating_users.description: A list of usernames who have been granted write access to the advisory.

collaborating_teams.description: A list of team slugs which have been granted write access to the advisory.
